title: Addi Bamboo Circular Knitting Needle, 3.25, Beige
features: addi Bamboo Fixed Circular Knitting Needles 80cm length with gold cord. Lightweight, sustainably sourced bamboo tips with long lasting wax coating. Smooth and strong with ultra-pliable cords and snag-free joins for easy knitting. Naturally warm to the touch - great for arthritic hands.

CONSTRUCTION: addi Nature bamboo circulars combine the flexibility of the addi cable with the beauty of smooth bamboo tips and are the perfect choice for those looking for superior craftsmanship in a bamboo circular; includes the ultra-pliable Gold cords and snag-free joins
*: Item is covered by GUSTAV SELTER GmbH & Co. KG 2 year * from any defect, deficiency or imperfection
